kycRequired.title: Warning
kycRequired.message:
Dear users,

You can purchase Clean Sat Mining tokens after completing the following two steps:

1) In accordance with legal requirements, all users must first complete the KYC process on the CleanSat Mining marketplace before being able to make purchases within our application. We therefore invite you to register on the marketplace and finalize your KYC

2) Please note that CSM tokens are subject to a whitelist of approved addresses for interactions. Any transaction of these tokens to an unauthorized address will fail. We invite you to add your token receiving addresses in the section of the marketplace provided for this purpose. An email will be sent to you when your address is whitelisted, this will take a few days. 


‚ö†Ô∏è VERY IMPORTANT ‚ö†Ô∏è
Be careful about the price at which you buy CSM tokens. CleanSat Mining is not responsible for online offers. You can see in the table below the initial price at which the tokens were sold, and the price proposed by the seller. Take this into account before investing in one of the CSM projects.

To contact us click here (email address contact@cleansatmining.com)

The CleanSat Mining team

createOfferInvalid.title: Error
createOfferInvalid.message: You can not create this offer. Please make sure: You are whitelisted for the offer token, the offer token is whitelisted and not in locking periode.

buyOfferInvalid.title: Error
buyOfferInvalid.message: You can not buy this offer. Please make sure: You are whitelisted for the offer token, the offer token is not in locking periode, you have enough buyer token balance in your wallet to pay the offer.
